CustomField.description: This is a CRMA populated field to store the Designation > Record type - Fund> HAM_Endowment_Book_Value_Date__c value for the record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a CRMA populated field to store the Designation > Record type - Fund> HAM_Endowment_Book_Value_Date__c value for the record. This will be shown in Portal and Jedi with the line" As of {Date}"
CustomField.label: HAM Endowed Fund Date
